projects.title: Todo
projects.da_description: Todo-liste app som virker offline, kan synkronisere med flere enheder uden login og kan installeres via Firefox.
projects.description: Todo-list app that works offline, syncronizes with multiple devices without login and is installable via Firefox.

projects.title: lores
projects.da_description: En eksperimentiel app som konverterer ethvert billede til noget der ligner et skærmbillede fra et gammelt computer-system. Komplet med dithering algoritmer og emulering af attribute clashing.
projects.description: An experimental app that converts any picture to something that resembles a screen dump from an old computer system. Complete with dithering algorithms and attribute clashing.

projects.title: Street Art Copenhagen
projects.da_description: Mini-projekt om street-art. Henter relevante billeder fra Instagram.
projects.description: Mini-projekt about street-art. Fetches relevant pictures from Instagram.

projects.title: SmagSilkeborg
projects.da_description: Mobile-first-løsning til foreningen SmagSilkeborg. Gør brug af geo-location til at finde de nærmeste medlemmer.
projects.description: Mobile-first-solution for the union SmagSilkeborg. Makes use of geo-location for finding nearest members.

projects.title: Jul i Den Gamle By
projects.da_description: Kampagneside for Den Gamle By's jule-arrangement. Komplet med dalende jule-sne!
projects.description: Campaign site for Den Gamle By's christmas event. Complete with falling christmas-snow!

projects.title: Space rocks... In space..!!
projects.da_description: Sejt asteroide-spil, der kan styres med piletaster, touch og gamepad.
projects.description: Cool asteroid game, controllable with arrow keys, touch and gamepad.

projects.title: platformer
projects.da_description: Et simpelt lille platformspil kodet i CoffeeScript og gør brug af canvas.
projects.description: A simple little platform game coded in CoffeeScript and makes use of canvas.

projects.title: particles
projects.da_description: En flot fyrværkeri-agtig partikelbrønd, som gør brug af canvas.
projects.description: A pretty firework-ish particle fountain that makes use of canvas.

projects.title: cirkelspil
projects.da_description: Simpelt lille spil hvor man skal klikke på cirkler.
projects.description: A simple little game where you click on circles.

projects.title: TurboSweeper
projects.da_description: Minestryger med autopilot. Kodet i Java kompileret til JavaScript med GWT.
projects.description: Minesweeper with auto pilot. Coded in Java compiled to JavaScript with GWT.

projects.title: Matrix
projects.da_description: Kode-regn af japanske tegn i ægte Matrix-stil.
projects.description: Rain of japaneese characters, Matrix style.

projects.title: Star Rain
projects.da_description: Mit første forsøg med canvas. En regn af stjerner.
projects.description: My first attempt at canvas. A rain of stars.

projects.title: DWIB
projects.da_description: Mit første forsøg med Ajax og DHTML. Et lille OS, der kører i browseren.
projects.description: My first attempt at Ajax and DHTML. A little OS inside the browser.
